content: Hello! My name is Strahinja Gvozdić, I am a Master student at ETH Zurich and I'd like to contribute to the mathlib project. For the moment, I'd like to contribute with a proof of the Weak non-commutative Kneser's theorem listed in TODO of VerySmallDoubling (https://terrytao.wordpress.com/2009/11/10/an-elementary-non-commutative-freiman-theorem/).
Hey, :wave: very nice! Please ping me when you open the PR :slight_smile:
